title.rendered: Updated versions of Obozrevatel.com applications are already avalilable

content.rendered:
Today we’re receiving greetings for our iPhone and Android applications for Obozrevatel.com got updated with new functionality.

In the new version user can upload news to the portal and try himself as a journalist.

Android-application is available here
You can download iPhone-app here

excerpt.rendered: Today we’re receiving greetings for our iPhone and Android applications for Obozrevatel.com got updated with new functionality. In the new version user can upload news…
